name: Sustainable Samurai
description:
SAVING THE PLANET, ONE BODY AT A TIME!!

A side scrolling action game. As the Samurai, you must stop the evil Chairman Drump from destroying the environment.

This level one features The SAMURAI traveling through the forest, trying to make his way to the site manager’s office. Destroying anything with Drump branding on the way.

Resistance is met along the way in the form of DRUMP LOGGERS, some with axes, others with chainsaws.

Please feeel free to leave us some feedback in the comments to help us improve our game! Find more on our website:

https://www.sustainablesamuraithegame.com/
